name: DeleteInvoice
description:
Delete a draft invoice and change order status to CANCELED.

This tool deletes a specified draft invoice. Once deleted, the associated order status changes to CANCELED. It cannot delete a published invoice, including those scheduled for processing.

parameters.name: invoice_id
parameters.description: The ID of the draft invoice to delete.

value_schema.description: The ID of the invoice to delete.

parameters.name: invoice_version
parameters.description: The version number of the invoice to delete. Use GetInvoice or ListInvoices if unknown.

value_schema.description:
The version of the [invoice](entity:Invoice) to delete.
If you do not know the version, you can call [GetInvoice](api-endpoint:Invoices-GetInvoice) or 
[ListInvoices](api-endpoint:Invoices-ListInvoices).

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the squareup API.

value_schema.description:
The version of the [invoice](entity:Invoice) to delete.
If you do not know the version, you can call [GetInvoice](api-endpoint:Invoices-GetInvoice) or

parameters.description: The ID of the invoice to delete.

value_schema.description: The ID of the invoice to delete.
